00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_VERB_H
00012 #define TT_VERB_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 #include "tt_multitap.h"

00018 /********************************************************
00019         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00020 
00021         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00022  ********************************************************/
00023 
00024 // NOTE: I BELIEVE THE PATCH VERSION HAD A SECOND BANK OF MODULATORS MODULATING THE LFOS
00025 
00026 class tt_verb:public tt_audio_base{
00027 
00028         private:
00029                 enum constants{
00030                         k_num_temp_signals = 9,
00031                 };
00032                 tt_attribute_value              delay_time;                                     // The specified delay time
00033                 float                                   delay_base[6];                          // Base delay times for the 6 comb filters
00034                 tt_attribute_value              decay_time;                                     // Decay Time in seconds
00035                 tt_attribute_value              damping_cf;                                     // Lowpass CF in the comb feedback loops
00036                 tt_attribute_value              output_cf;                                      // Master Lowpass CF
00037                 tt_attribute_value              moddepth;
00038                 tt_attribute_value              modfreq;
00039                 tt_attribute_value_bool use_early_reflections;
00040                 tt_attribute_value_bool use_lite_version;
00041                 
00042                 tt_multitap                             *early_reflections;                     // other taptools objects used in this effect...
00043                 tt_comb                                 *comb_filters[6];
00044                 tt_lfo                                  *lfos[6];
00045                 tt_allpass                              *my_allpass;
00046                 tt_lowpass_onepole              *my_lowpass;
00047                 tt_mixer_mono                   *mixer;
00048                 tt_crossfade                    *xfade;                                         // mix
00049                 tt_gain                                 *master_gain;                           // gain
00050 
00051                 tt_audio_signal                 *temp[k_num_temp_signals];      // Temp Signals
00052                 
00053                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00054                 typedef void (tt_verb::*FuncPtr)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00055                 FuncPtr dsp_executor;
00056 
00057         
00058         public:
00059                 enum selectors{                 // Attribute Selectors
00060                         k_mix,
00061                         k_gain,
00062                         k_delay,
00063                         k_decay,
00064                         k_damping,
00065                         k_lowpass,
00066                         k_modfreq,
00067                         k_moddepth,
00068                         k_use_early_reflections,
00069                         k_use_lite_version,
00070                 };
00071                 
00072 
00073                 // OBJECT LIFE ************************************************************
00074                 tt_verb()                                                                               // Constructor          
00075                 {
00076                         short i;
00077                         for(i=0; i < k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00078                                 temp[i] = new tt_audio_signal(vectorsize);                      // allocate temp signals
00079                         
00080                                 early_reflections = new tt_multitap(100.0f);            // 80 millisecond max delay time for early reflections
00081                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_num_taps, 18);
00082                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_master_gain, -24.0); // Master gain for the multitap unit
00083                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 0, 4.3);
00084                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 0, amplitude_to_decibels(0.841));
00085                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 1, 21.5);
00086                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 1, amplitude_to_decibels(0.504));
00087                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 2, 22.5);
00088                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 2, amplitude_to_decibels(0.491));
00089                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 3, 26.8);
00090                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 3, amplitude_to_decibels(0.379));
00091                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 4, 27.0);
00092                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 4, amplitude_to_decibels(0.38));
00093                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 5, 29.8);
00094                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 5, amplitude_to_decibels(0.346));
00095                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 6, 45.8);
00096                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 6, amplitude_to_decibels(0.289));
00097                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 7, 48.5);
00098                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 7, amplitude_to_decibels(0.272));
00099                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 8, 57.2);
00100                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 8, amplitude_to_decibels(0.192));
00101                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 9, 58.7);
00102                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 9, amplitude_to_decibels(0.193));
00103                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 10, 59.5);
00104                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 10, amplitude_to_decibels(0.217));
00105                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 11, 61.2);
00106                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 11, amplitude_to_decibels(0.181));
00107                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 12, 70.7);
00108                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 12, amplitude_to_decibels(0.18));
00109                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 13, 70.8);
00110                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 13, amplitude_to_decibels(0.181));
00111                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 14, 72.6);
00112                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 14, amplitude_to_decibels(0.176));
00113                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 15, 74.1);
00114                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 15, amplitude_to_decibels(0.142));
00115                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 16, 75.3);
00116                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 16, amplitude_to_decibels(0.167));
00117                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_delay_ms, 17, 79.7);
00118                                 early_reflections->set_attr(tt_multitap::k_gain, 17, amplitude_to_decibels(0.134));
00119 
00120                                 for(i=0; i<6; i++){
00121                                         comb_filters[i] = new tt_comb(200.0);   // comb filters have a max delay time of 200 ms.
00122                                         lfos[i] = new tt_lfo;                                   // LFOs each use the default 512 point sinewave
00123                                 }
00124                                 
00125                                 my_allpass = new tt_allpass(7.0);                       // 7 millisecond max delay time
00126                                         my_allpass->set_attr(tt_allpass::k_delay_ms, 5.98);
00127                                         my_allpass->set_attr(tt_allpass::k_gain, 0.7);
00128                                         
00129                                 my_lowpass = new tt_lowpass_onepole;
00130                                 xfade = new tt_crossfade;
00131                                 mixer = new tt_mixer_mono;
00132                                         for(i=0; i<7; i++)
00133                                                 mixer->set_attr(tt_mixer_mono::k_channel_gain, i, 1.0);
00134                                         mixer->set_attr(tt_mixer_mono::k_master_gain, 0.125);
00135                                 master_gain = new tt_gain;
00136                                 
00137                                 // Default Settings
00138                                 set_attr(k_delay, 100.0);
00139                                 set_attr(k_decay, 3.5);
00140                                 set_attr(k_damping, 20000.0);
00141                                 set_attr(k_modfreq, 0.1);
00142                                 set_attr(k_moddepth, 0.1);
00143                                 set_attr(k_lowpass, 15000.0);
00144                                 set_attr(k_mix, 50.0);
00145                                 set_attr(k_gain, 0.0);
00146                                 use_lite_version = false;
00147                                 set_attr(k_use_early_reflections, true);
00148                 }
00149 
00150                 ~tt_verb()                                                                      // Destructor
00151                 {
00152                         short i;
00153         
00154                         delete early_reflections;
00155                         delete my_allpass;
00156                         delete my_lowpass;
00157                         delete xfade;
00158                         delete master_gain;
00159                         delete mixer;
00160                         for(i=0; i<6; i++){
00161                                 delete comb_filters[i];
00162                                 delete lfos[i];
00163                         }
00164         
00165                         // FREE THE TEMP VECTORS
00166                         for(i=0; i<k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00167                                 delete temp[i];
00168                 }
00169 
00170 
00171                 // ATTRIBUTES ************************************************************
00172                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00173                 {
00174                         short i;
00175                         switch(sel){
00176                                 case k_mix:
00177                                         xfade->set_attr(tt_crossfade::k_position, val * 0.01);
00178                                         break;
00179                                 case k_gain:
00180                                         master_gain->set_attr(tt_gain::k_gain, val);
00181                                         break;
00182                                 case k_delay:
00183                                         delay_time = val;
00184                                         delay_base[0] = deviate(val * 0.641027);
00185                                         delay_base[1] = deviate(val * 0.717950);
00186                                         delay_base[2] = deviate(val * 0.782052);
00187                                         delay_base[3] = deviate(val * 0.871796);
00188                                         delay_base[4] = deviate(val * 0.923078);
00189                                         delay_base[5] = deviate(val * 1.0);
00190                                         break;
00191                                 case k_decay:
00192                                         for(i=0; i<6; i++)
00193                                                 comb_filters[i]->set_attr(tt_comb::k_decay, deviate(val));
00194                                         decay_time = val;
00195                                         break;
00196                                 case k_damping:
00197                                         for(i=0; i<6; i++)
00198                                                 comb_filters[i]->set_attr(tt_comb::k_cutoff_frequency, val);
00199                                         damping_cf = val;
00200                                         break;
00201                                 case k_lowpass:
00202                                         my_lowpass->set_attr(tt_lowpass_onepole::k_frequency, val);
00203                                         output_cf = val;
00204                                         break;
00205                                 case k_moddepth:
00206                                         for(i=0; i<6; i++)
00207                                                 lfos[i]->set_attr(tt_lfo::k_gain, deviate(amplitude_to_decibels(val)));
00208                                         moddepth = val;
00209                                         break;
00210                                 case k_modfreq:
00211                                         for(i=0; i<6; i++)
00212                                                 lfos[i]->set_attr(tt_lfo::k_frequency, deviate(val));
00213                                         modfreq = val;
00214                                         break;
00215                                 case k_use_early_reflections:
00216                                         use_early_reflections = (tt_attribute_value_bool)val;
00217                                         config_dsp_pointers();  
00218                                         break;
00219                                 case k_use_lite_version:
00220                                         use_lite_version = (tt_attribute_value_bool)val;
00221                                         config_dsp_pointers();
00222                                         break;  
00223                         }
00224                 }
00225 
00226                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00227                 {
00228                         switch(sel){
00229                                 case k_mix:
00230                                         return xfade->get_attr(tt_crossfade::k_position) * 100.0;
00231                                 case k_gain:
00232                                         return master_gain->get_attr(tt_gain::k_gain);
00233                                 case k_delay:
00234                                         return delay_time;
00235                                 case k_decay:
00236                                         return decay_time;
00237                                 case k_damping:
00238                                         return damping_cf;
00239                                 case k_lowpass:
00240                                         return output_cf;
00241                                 case k_moddepth:
00242                                         return moddepth;
00243                                 case k_modfreq:
00244                                         return modfreq;
00245                                 case k_use_early_reflections:
00246                                         return (tt_attribute_value)use_early_reflections;
00247                                 case k_use_lite_version:
00248                                         return (tt_attribute_value)use_lite_version;
00249                                 default:
00250                                         return -1;
00251                         }
00252                 }
00253                 
00254                 
00255                 /*****************************************************
00256                  * DSP LOOPS
00257                  *****************************************************/
00258                 // Because this is a meta-object, it is the user of this object who is responsible for making sure that
00259                 //      the vectorsize of the signals are the same as that of this object.
00260 
00261                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00262                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00263                 {
00264                         (*this.*dsp_executor)(in, out);         // Run the function pointed to by our function pointer
00265                 }
00266 
00267         private:
00268                 // DSP LOOP: WITH EARLY REFLECTIONS
00269                 void dsp_vector_calc_normal(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00270                 {
00271                         short i;
00272                         
00273                         // Early Reflections
00274                         early_reflections->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[0]);
00275                         
00276                         // LFOs & Comb Filters
00277                         // Unrolling this for-loop for speed doesn't seem to make a difference - compiler must be doing this automagically
00278                         for(i=0; i<6; i++){
00279                                 lfos[i]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[8]);                                                                                                              // Run the LFO
00280                                 comb_filters[i]->set_attr(tt_comb::k_delay_static, *temp[8]->vector + delay_base[i]);   // take the 1st value of the vector
00281                                 comb_filters[i]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[i+1]);                                                                   // Comb Stage
00282                         }
00283                         
00284                         // Sum the Comb Filters (1-6) and early reflections (0)
00285                         mixer->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1], temp[2], temp[3], temp[4], temp[5], temp[6], temp[7]);
00286                         
00287                         // Allpass Stage
00288                         my_allpass->dsp_vector_calc(temp[7], temp[2]);
00289 
00290                         // Post-Processing
00291                         my_lowpass->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[3]);  // Final Lowpass
00292                         xfade->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[3], temp[4]);   // Wet-Dry Mix
00293                         master_gain->dsp_vector_calc(temp[4], out);             // Output Gain Control
00294                 }
00295 
00296 
00297                 // DSP LOOP: NO EARLY REFLECTIONS
00298                 void dsp_vector_calc_no_reflections(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00299                 {
00300                         short i;
00301                         
00302                         // LFOs & Comb Filters
00303                         for(i=0; i<6; i++){
00304                                 lfos[i]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[8]);                                                                                                              // Run the LFO
00305                                 comb_filters[i]->set_attr(tt_comb::k_delay_static, *temp[8]->vector + delay_base[i]);   // take the 1st value of the vector
00306                                 comb_filters[i]->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[i+1]);                                                                                // Comb Stage
00307                         }
00308                         
00309                         // Sum the Comb Filters (1-6) to the output (7)
00310                         mixer->dsp_vector_calc(temp[1], temp[2], temp[3], temp[4], temp[5], temp[6], temp[7]);
00311                         
00312                         // Allpass Stage
00313                         my_allpass->dsp_vector_calc(temp[7], temp[2]);
00314 
00315                         // Post-Processing
00316                         my_lowpass->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], temp[3]);  // Final Lowpass
00317                         xfade->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[3], temp[4]);   // Wet-Dry Mix
00318                         master_gain->dsp_vector_calc(temp[4], out);             // Output Gain Control
00319                 }
00320 
00321                 // DSP LOOP: WITH EARLY REFLECTIONS **** LITE
00322                 void dsp_vector_calc_normal_lite(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00323                 {
00324                         short i;
00325                         
00326                         // Early Reflections
00327                         early_reflections->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[0]);
00328                         
00329                         // LFOs & Comb Filters
00330                         // Unrolling this for-loop for speed doesn't seem to make a difference - compiler must be doing this automagically
00331                         for(i=0; i<6; i++){
00332                                 lfos[i]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[8]);                                                                                                              // Run the LFO
00333                                 comb_filters[i]->set_attr(tt_comb::k_delay_static, *temp[8]->vector + delay_base[i]);   // take the 1st value of the vector
00334                                 comb_filters[i]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[i+1]);                                                                   // Comb Stage
00335                         }
00336                         
00337                         // Sum the Comb Filters (1-6) and early reflections (0)
00338                         mixer->dsp_vector_calc(temp[0], temp[1], temp[2], temp[3], temp[4], temp[5], temp[6], temp[7]);
00339                         
00340                         // Allpass Stage
00341                         my_allpass->dsp_vector_calc(temp[7], temp[2]);
00342 
00343                         // Post-Processing
00344                         my_lowpass->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], out);      // Final Lowpass
00345                         // LITE: No Wet-Dry Mix
00346                         // LITE: No Output Gain Control
00347                 }
00348 
00349 
00350                 // DSP LOOP: NO EARLY REFLECTIONS **** LITE
00351                 void dsp_vector_calc_no_reflections_lite(tt_audio_signal *in, tt_audio_signal *out)
00352                 {
00353                         short i;
00354                         
00355                         // LFOs & Comb Filters
00356                         for(i=0; i<6; i++){
00357                                 lfos[i]->dsp_vector_calc(temp[8]);                                                                                                              // Run the LFO
00358                                 comb_filters[i]->set_attr(tt_comb::k_delay_static, *temp[8]->vector + delay_base[i]);   // take the 1st value of the vector
00359                                 comb_filters[i]->dsp_vector_calc(in, temp[i+1]);                                                                                // Comb Stage
00360                         }
00361                         
00362                         // Sum the Comb Filters (1-6) to the output (7)
00363                         mixer->dsp_vector_calc(temp[1], temp[2], temp[3], temp[4], temp[5], temp[6], temp[7]);
00364                         
00365                         // Allpass Stage
00366                         my_allpass->dsp_vector_calc(temp[7], temp[2]);
00367 
00368                         // Post-Processing
00369                         my_lowpass->dsp_vector_calc(temp[2], out);      // Final Lowpass
00370                         // LITE: No Wet-Dry Mix
00371                         // LITE: No Output Gain Control
00372                 }

00376 
00377         public:
00378                 // ADDITIONAL METHODS ************************************************************
00379                 
00380                 // clear
00381                 void clear()
00382                 {
00383                         short i;
00384                         for(i=0;i<6;i++)
00385                                 comb_filters[i]->clear();
00386                         my_allpass->clear();
00387                         my_lowpass->clear();
00388                         early_reflections->clear();
00389                 }
00390                 
00391                 // set sample-rate (override the inherited method)
00392                 void set_sr(int value)
00393                 {
00394                         short i;
00395                         
00396                         sr = value;
00397                         r_sr = 1.0 / value;
00398                         m_sr = sr * 0.001;
00399                         
00400                         early_reflections->set_sr(sr);
00401                         my_allpass->set_sr(sr);
00402                         my_lowpass->set_sr(sr);
00403                         xfade->set_sr(sr);
00404                         master_gain->set_sr(sr);
00405                         mixer->set_sr(sr);
00406                         for(i=0; i<6; i++){
00407                                 comb_filters[i]->set_sr(sr);
00408                                 lfos[i]->set_sr(sr);
00409                         }                       
00410                 }
00411 
00412                 // set the vector size (override the inherited method)
00413                 void set_vectorsize(int value)
00414                 {
00415                         short i;
00416                         vectorsize = value;
00417                         
00418                         early_reflections->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00419                         my_allpass->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00420                         my_lowpass->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00421                         xfade->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00422                         master_gain->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00423                         mixer->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00424                         for(i=0; i<6; i++){
00425                                 comb_filters[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00426                                 lfos[i]->set_vectorsize(vectorsize);
00427                         }
00428         
00429                         // FREE THE TEMP VECTORS
00430                         for(i=0; i<k_num_temp_signals; i++)
00431                                 temp[i]->alloc(vectorsize);
00432                 }
00433                 
00434         private:
00435                 void config_dsp_pointers()
00436                 {
00437                         if(use_early_reflections && use_lite_version)
00438                                 dsp_executor = &tt_verb::dsp_vector_calc_normal_lite;
00439                         else if(use_early_reflections)
00440                                 dsp_executor = &tt_verb::dsp_vector_calc_normal;
00441                         else if(use_lite_version)
00442                                 dsp_executor = &tt_verb::dsp_vector_calc_no_reflections_lite;
00443                         else
00444                                 dsp_executor = &tt_verb::dsp_vector_calc_no_reflections;        
00445                 }
00446                 
00447 };
